Will be true if this is any Mac operating system and false otherwise.
MAC_OS_X - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.CAConstants
Will be true if this is specifically a Mac OS X operating system and false otherwise (true only for OS X and not other Mac operating systems).

MovingFractal - Class in cellularAutomata.rules
A lattice-gas-style rule with vectors of complex numbers.

MultiGenerationBinaryRuleTemplate - Class in cellularAutomata.rules.templates
A template/convenience class for all rules that behave as boolean function of their neighbors at the current and some previous number of time steps.
MultiGenerationBinaryRuleTemplate(boolean) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.rules.templates.MultiGenerationBinaryRuleTemplate
Create a rule using the given cellular automaton properties.
MultiGenerationIntegerRuleTemplate - Class in cellularAutomata.rules.templates
A convenience class/template for all rules that behave as an integer function of their neighbors, both at the current time step and for an arbitrary number of previous time steps.
MultiGenerationIntegerRuleTemplate(boolean) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.rules.templates.MultiGenerationIntegerRuleTemplate
Create a rule using the given cellular automaton properties.
